prompt: The top figure shows a convex hull (orange filled shape), with distance from the origin $\gamma_\infty$ (purple vector), generated by potential couplings $\gamma_i$ (teal vectors) and axion couplings $\lambda_r$ (cyan vectors) such that $\smash{\gamma_\infty \cdot \lambda_r < 0}$. The bottom figure shows the relevant part of the canonical-scalar theory that is relevant to computing the late-time $\epsilon$-parameter.
